abstract: Oklahoma prisoner dies in hospital from injuries sustained in two minute melee which killed three other inmates; Corrections Corporation of America-owned prison is on lockdown for the second time since June, after similar brawl.
lead_paragraph: A prisoner wounded in an outbreak of violence at the Cimarron Correctional Facility in Oklahoma died of his injuries, bringing the number of dead fto four.

headline.main: 4th Inmate Dies After Oklahoma Prison Brawl

snippet: A prisoner wounded in an outbreak of violence at the Cimarron Correctional Facility in Oklahoma died of his injuries, bringing the number of dead fto four.
